formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the application for the snapshot. Either this parameter or the service name parameter should be provided.

formElement.label: Service Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the service for the snapshot. Either this parameter or the application name parameter should be provided.

formElement.label: Project Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the project that contains the application or service.

formElement.label: Snapshot Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the snapshot to be created.

formElement.label: Environment Name:
formElement.documentation: For an environment snapshot, specify the name of the environment where the application or service is deployed.

formElement.label: Environment Project Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the project that contains the environment, if different from the application or service project.

formElement.label: Component Versions:
formElement.documentation: This option applies only when the environment name is not specified. For an application snapshot, provide a Space-delimited list of component names and versions to be used. Use keyword 'LATEST' to indicate latest version. E.g., ec_comp1-version=1.1 ec_comp2-version=LATEST.

formElement.label: Overwrite:
formElement.documentation: If checked, any existing snapshot with the same name will be overwritten.
